issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

fields.summary: Improve error logging for "java.lang.IllegalArgumentException: Src_file does not exist for config file: httpd-proxy.conf"

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.description:
Scenario:

Run "yarn app -destroy" cli with a application name which does not exist.

Here, The cli should return a message " Application does not exists" instead it is returning a message "Destroyed cluster httpd-xxx"
fields.summary: Fix logging for destroy yarn service cli when app does not exist and some minor bugs
